errors.symptom: User expected display rules to automatically update after modifying SHACL shape, not understanding the separation between data model configuration and UI presentation rules
errors.trigger: After adding abstract property in SHACL, user expected YAML display rules to auto-generate ('mi aspetto che le display rules allora cambino direttamente sulla base delle shacl shape'), then searched unsuccessfully for 'dcterms abstract' in configuration files

errors.symptom: Configuration changes not visible on first page reload due to backend restart delay
errors.trigger: Backend required several seconds to restart after YAML configuration modification, causing changes to not appear on first page reload ('Non Ã¨ cambiato niente'). User reloaded page a second time and changes appeared
